title: Traits and Features
content: and have Resistance to all damage except psychic damage. Wildheart Lvl 3 Eagle Heart Feature While raging, you can use Diving Strike. Foes also have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you, and you can use Dash as a bonus action. Wildheart Lvl 3 Elk Heart Feature While raging, you can use Primal Stampede, and you Movement Speed increases by 4.5m.
